DOC.detailed_description: A Multi-Center , Randomized , Double-Blind , Placebo-Controlled Phase 3 Safety Effectiveness Trial Vaginal Matrix Ring Containing Dapivirine Prevention HIV-1 Infection Women . '' MTN-020 enroll approximately 3676 sexually active HIVnegative woman age 18-45 year randomize 1:1 ratio receive either vaginal ring contain 25 mg dapivirine placebo vaginal ring . Rings insert every 28 day 12 consecutive month . MTN expect initiate study August 2012 .
